AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.marijuana: possession of which Carlos Martinez-Romero was convicted, found in six bundles totaling one hundred and sixty-nine pounds in the toolbox
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Carlos Martinez-Romero's crew-cab truck: vehicle used by Carlos Martinez-Romero during the stop, with a modified back seat
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol Agent David: vehicle used by United States Border Patrol Agent David Fitzgerald to follow Carlos Martinez-Romero
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the modification: alteration to the crew-cab truck's back seat area, suspected to be for illegal purposes
